data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Montpellier.
Throw-in Montpellier.
Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Montpellier.
Montpellier's Teji Savanier misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Florent Mollet gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montpellier.
Andy Delort of Montpellier gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Mosson.
Throw-in for Montpellier in the half of Strasbourg.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Montpellier just outside Strasbourg's area.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Strasbourg are pushing forward but Adrien Thomasson's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Mosson.
Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Montpellier's area.
Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
Andy Delort for Montpellier drives towards goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick Montpellier.
Montpellier attack but Gaetan Laborde's header doesn't find the target.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Montpellier needs to be cautious. Strasbourg have an attacking throw-in.
Mikael Lesage awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Strasbourg pushes forward through Lebo Mothiba, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Strasbourg push forward at Stade de la Mosson and Kenny Lala gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Montpellier defence.
In Montpellier Strasbourg drive forward through Dimitri Lienard. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Strasbourg's half?
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Strasbourg's Adrien Thomasson is on target but unsuccessful.
Strasbourg's Lebo Mothiba gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Andy Delort (Montpellier) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Montpellier are coming forward and Teji Savanier gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Mihailo Ristic.
Mihailo Ristic returns to the field for Montpellier after picking up a slight injury.
Ludovic Ajorque (Strasbourg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick in a good position for Strasbourg!
Important block from the Montpellier defence as Dimitri Lienard fires in a strike for Strasbourg.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Lamine Kone (Strasbourg) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Mikael Lesage awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Gaetan Laborde's header is off-target for Montpellier.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
Strasbourg have a dangerous throw-in.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Free kick Montpellier.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Montpellier.
Florent Mollet of Montpellier smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Montpellier.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Montpellier's Gaetan Laborde gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Strasbourg defender.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Stade de la Mosson.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
Florent Mollet gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montpellier.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mikael Lesage signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Montpellier's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the home team.
An attacking Montpellier player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Alexander Djiku (Strasbourg) has received a first yellow card.
Teji Savanier smashes in a penalty at Stade de la Mosson. The score is now 1-0.
Montpellier drives forward and Teji Savanier gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
So close for Montpellier as Gaetan Laborde's shot comes back off the post.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Montpellier Strasbourg drive forward through Kenny Lala. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Strasbourg are coming forward and Dimitri Lienard gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Mikael Lesage awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Goal! Gaetan Laborde extends Montpellier lead to 2-0 with a header.
Mihailo Ristic instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Kenny Lala of Strasbourg gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
Goal! Teji Savanier extends Montpellier's lead to 3-0.
Great play from Gaetan Laborde to set up the goal.
Majeed Waris is replacing Ludovic Ajorque for Strasbourg at Stade de la Mosson.
In Montpellier, Majeed Waris (Strasbourg) misses the target with a header.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
Michel Der Zakarian is making the team's first substitution at Stade de la Mosson with Joris Chotard replacing Jordan Ferri.
Mikael Lesage signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Montpellier's half.
Montpellier drives forward and Florent Mollet gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Ibrahima Sissoko is on a sub for Dimitri Lienard for Strasbourg.
Montpellier's Damien Le Tallec misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Mosson.
Free kick Strasbourg.
At Stade de la Mosson, Damien Le Tallec has been yellow-carded for the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The home team have replaced Gaetan Laborde with Junior Sambia. This is the second substitution made today by Michel Der Zakarian.
Ibrahima Sissoko (Strasbourg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Andy Delort for Montpellier drives towards goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Can Strasbourg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jeanricner Bellegarde of Strasbourg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Montpellier.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Montpellier.
Montpellier make their third substitution with Yun Il-Lok replacing Thibault Vargas.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
Andy Delort (Montpellier) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Mikael Lesage awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a third substitution, with Lucien Kevin Zohi replacing Lebo Mothiba.
Mikael Lesage blows against Strasbourg's Jeanricner Bellegarde for offside.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Strasbourg have a dangerous throw-in.
Mihailo Ristic for Montpellier gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Montpellier's area.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Montpellier are pushing forward but Junior Sambia's finish is wide of the goal.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
In Montpellier, [62] of [63] is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
Majeed Waris (Strasbourg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
